feed.title: Zola Releases

entry.title: New release for Zola: v0.19.0
entry.content:
Changes:

  • 6f585856b4af248846650979895eca948fbd308f Ready for release
  • 4b0d13c0c702d62d9b70e660d6a49f82340f8163 Disable problematic test on Windows for now
  • 0bb37c43f66e9617ec7383d51c177dff9d968e4e Try to update images on azure pipelines
  • c054ed1b10163085f82805ba630d54ffbc3b8d03 Added support for multiple feeds (i.e. generating both Atom and RSS) (#2477)
  • 7f59792d501b0b46f27d50c6ce481de471248e5a Add unit tests to create a verify base url permutations. (#2484)
  • f60bda42f06ff97d04976adf0fd068fe788bda86 Update deps
  • ff9622f13224a7ecb5dfafbf6deb29fb087fcb80 Add support for yaml datetimes (#2208)
  • 9c1b004b13380723aa23ab4929614820ce673e3f Fix tests
  • cb2a4b0ee8b82c5efa9675c31e65cfc63766da92 Prevent generating folder & index.html for a specific page
  • c5991fc814a8151cbc8136ed0a70ea25350e20d7 fix ignore links to #top when checking anchors (#2519)
See More * 26f6677bfb6411f500be29d135bb2995a9335f86 Add support for Fuse.js search format (#2507) * 0d0036e14a28b5224dea6b71b17c69077f636c06 Update changelog * 2980d16da3fa3cf170cb53e4153c0b9ec0bb0ce5 feat: fix hot loading for config.toml changes on Linux (#2498) * 7294c76f6be5b3997c29a08c0aa8a4c8d3afce6a More more things to fs_utils file * 5b3a57b1ac19236629e76adf677c20762cfc8aba feat: move from notify v4 to notify-debouncer-full (#2503) * f4808679128c1e3ca4a97e6652655b817fa81241 cargo fmt * f4959bfd7e81d765cd80d4bcca30e93a0b6458c1 update tests * 2243e601c337fc4586d45f0223a52ba96e3b2d84 Update msrv * a3b0447f40e64a98ba828437a570a501f64a2378 Update changelog * 81db65def863ade4dd4864cb77ee33e06bf98aab Update deps * 6a2b890545398bb21cab57a3ba2ad8058bc229f2 Implemented bottom footnotes with backreferences (#2480) [ #1285 ] * 28a9da46efb2225c368931e75c2dc844fd9f5096 Restore trailing slash behaviour in serve command (#2482) * 96a9dc1a28e8bf921305b97ad5854434c78f0bce Refactor: remove even more unnecessary create_directory (#2428) * 9413d943f193f6722f27a422ea46bc9bac030453 Fix link check report inconsistency (#2472) * 6a25b62d43dfcf3f0d0f76638cdbce6cc511452a Fix resizing for images with EXIF orientation (#2468) * 954f1ce533c61a64472fde5c63a904c95d48c511 Fix section transparency serialization (#2462) * c072b32c7c1ada1f7fe5bcd2c2744da6bd7273b8 Fix --base-url improper path and protocol handling using `zola serve` (#2311) * aa8198658055638a59aee6b15b787a80ef6d59c6 Add MIME type to get_image_metadata (#2409) * 13682e1342e2c0135d7a99ffb4c065f677665afb Update pulldown_cmark dep to v0.10, and add pulldown_cmark_escape dep. (#2432) * 80bcc51fd227a659ef2f5141f92c72e362eb08b9 Issue 2359 get section by lang (#2410) * 7d18ddfde20d1190409ffebb2560a1d715e7b240 Allow ignoring files when link checking (#2264) * bdb18657b64d88e33912337a2b1a0f9c927142f9 Refactor: copy_assets instead of copy_asset (#2418) * 7fb0a70477e9cccf44deb0d8fe023c362a2a5176 Refactor: create_directory responsibly (#2407) * 9890df7d646864716dd3bd8dec0b6f5441dff6eb Allow IPv6 serve, default `base_url` to listen interface instead of 127.0.0.1 (#2395) * 13a4d9d9cfd9b0dd17516357002843044eafc5de fix(serve): content can be served from output_path (#2398) * a01e36bd86a7c3773397d27ef7c4d572c0abd9df Match `` in addition to `` (#2397) * a9ab3592c82b36906589b758b8d6f7beb6d8cbef Add option to include date in search index (#2401) * 8bdec67f0a7017cf2c000578932372b8b7f607c3 Next version * b965c89d12689d658a70f67f78d9de76b1a1cf48 Added documentation about relative image resizing and scaling of high-res (#2096) * 692c690a229ebd255dcc325f98d5bf40f2868d49 Update themes gallery (#2524) * 68a7002b43791d1ec4ecba0e00e30383cee14f3a Docs: Fix long words breaking the site on small screens (#2521) * c7f601f03ecdfad7956a76a802395cb79c024254 Update themes gallery (#2518) * 606c2be4255f2e78ac9205970fde186d1320070b Improve docs header style (#2516) * 0056851e3118c0f5be07b4b318016f0d68f7ab61 Fix theme images loading (#2517) * 8aedec9843e39c513cb4002d556bcb9ffdfcf850 Update themes gallery (#2510) * 3d0749d4782a2a9ebb2da537a056bb75839ce59a fix: fix docs CI workflow; build in MRs; build and deploy on master (#2504) * ceced4bf1c021a76e1f9061066a08cd660a10d41 Update themes gallery (#2505) * b0eacbc55cb5e699875c0e998532d2b69b99553a Spiff up the readme a bit. (#2501) * bf77b5223a45e8ea4fd527204cdd9f6c8e4215f2 Fix cloudflare pages asdf workaround (#2500) * 18245b323c041220851047f95eee2396b942abc9 Update themes gallery (#2490) * f682baa85ec4356ddabe1037a9c01d894d571025 docs(installation): Add information for Gentoo Linux (#2492) * b93640851eab8db6cc0f47419e050df2c762f3c4 Update overview.md (#2486) * 55e1844c1d6ba3d8a513b4184000e53d9e2f23d9 Docs: slugify.paths replaces whitespace with - not _ (#2474) * 0ec6a6c9734e9b3435a05b976b68877dcfca538d remove entries for sites that are no longer functional (#2470) * 9fefe84e695416ae1688ebfc6674d3d4b133bfa6 Update themes gallery (#2471) * 8c5df185f6da05c01364b1ee2ad96370ef6e86c4 Add www.joshuagawley.com to EXAMPLES.md (#2460) * 8af3e124a57c315b38f3bf61743c58ec3fffc5bb Point out that Sass compilation has to be enabled in config.toml (#2458) * 9a5e95cf3de3202dd106d29f301736801dd14bd4 fix CloudFront invalidation directive in publish.yml GitHub action file (#2456) * 4898d10b23039ba007104694ea2ad881c8a7f0ee docs: add failsafe.monster (#2455) * 11d2521d7a044501a3bbbb469137b7d4f771b0b8 Add mention of `authors` page variable to docs (#2451) * 18d28b70962ba2f90affaa8d1aa82afd981becee Fix typo in Fedora installation instructions (#2440) * cec01e6f48738bac78a5ecc812333aa7db1d861e Update themes gallery (#2425) * 4a56c068e034463f91ab49ce3b52cbcaf6d3059b Update themes gallery (#2406) * b89837a2cb9cce5f0f108bced8307468b3705767 Update installation.md to add winget command (#2413) * 9fe455892e850da0684817ae9553e61757d9e5e4 Add Zeabur deployment guide (#2408) * 52b29df01d90df13f1dd64e0cfd7c0d9bf14a01c Metainfo: Add 0.18.0 (#2402) * b3c95290897ce9bd442bf3a7f622d08668eb1430 Add more information about Vercel deployments (#2399) * 38199c125501e9ff0e700e96adaca72cc3f25d2b Update the GitLab Pages documentation (#2384) * 623756e7e34e96536f3a51f6815a9343b598ded7 fix: set the debian version used to build the Docker image (#2386) * 974a05d7be55afe23691ed610c43bd2f731f709c Update snapcraft version This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/getzola/zola/_build/results?buildId=3384&view=logs).

entry.title: New release for Zola: v0.19.1
entry.content:
Changes:

  • 041da029eedbca30c195bc9cd8c1acf89b4f60c0 Disable all serve tests for Windows for now
  • b97f8a1fe2bd3631e6e322d24c2b75c46aebb536 Update changelog + add back config.generate_feed in templates for now
  • 9774d761e393537efcaf4349866a8ff4967c5d61 fix: treat any data change as a modification (#2542)
  • 233e1cdcbd0dca22e6dde094a1bedd6209b82643 Closes #2537
  • 39dfc4b52520993464114550ceeebfdfeafcde6f Next version
  • 764b8cab84d0515751f557e88fa4bd7ed09a047e Remove remote icon (#2546)
  • 7d612c69db1a131cd3dd3bcaa5be52b0a646ab70 Metainfo: Add 0.19.0 (#2545)
  • 135e5e438b594f71cc70cbc2a97430009bd68053 Fix GitLab CI/CD getting stuck (#2543)
  • 1142370fdde56337e63ad6a70e2cf99855ea4081 Update themes gallery (#2544)
  • 2e17c776605621cea7673e442577d520113efca7 Better documentation for get_url [ #2530 ]
See More * 98843438c2f644c6cb9c3a00935abffb4c423bf8 Update images for release as well This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/getzola/zola/_build/results?buildId=3416&view=logs).

entry.title: New release for Zola: v0.19.2
entry.content:
Changes:

  • 1aa21e0d95a2a7a2ed98bdc9d06f96db82ac66b2 Get ready for release
  • 59d70749af4bdd0c1d590b983f52d1b121dc1055 Fix shortcode/continue-reading parsing with inline HTML (smaller version) (#2606)
  • 286b88e268bd314756badfb57f885a55d697db96 fix: zola panic if no static dir (#2608)
  • abc851049d750ac41aa695a9575095f6cc0514fa Add config option to ignore code blocks for word count (#2599)
  • 9dad6596651df282e70206082ea97b3f48ab89f1 chore(components/config): cleanup code (#2592)
  • 9594fa8d061fe30f2ce0f827627b162dbde3a09d fix(taxonomies): fix error messages (#2591)
  • 64c868c3d4db9911faddc65a623ce9b0ca0a72c5 fix: handle another fs event to fix change monitoring on Windows 10 (#2575)
  • b3fc3f49cf3dd0c6a2ca5be8ef2fa749a13a82b6 Add fields to disable sitemap.xml and robots.txt generation (#2579) [ #2248 ]
  • 8a26da7ec0607bc68c9aaea4c47af29610f712b0 Add documentation on deploying to Codeberg Pages (#2584)
  • 1cc3ad333a5a7ea054c8233122bde842a2d0c1f8 Ensure file exists when receiving events for zola serve [ #2563 ]
See More * 96f266e3f840d866112e2adf3533ab44785b7f3b Ignore Helix temp files * f8ded09a28fc409702d506aaa22fbaa4cb339673 Fix some feed_filenames issues with multi languages * 56122defdeb5730df48877127bad8406e8c629e1 Fix YAML date parsing (#2549) [ #2538 ] * aa2847aa1e94a17aee0245e34544042b1208b0d5 Next version * bbd8dd1900edf34273f7672523de0d126be32f0c Clarify shortcode usage (#2600) * 43af34ec54ae906d44021712395b0d202eaf5ffb Update themes gallery (#2611) * 8c3ec92d39447d91c121d0699f522295fe5529a7 fixed broken links (#2612) * 051becaa1c681165c9f32d30e4e4bde3952765bc Update themes gallery (#2597) * 718274c368dbab25530f7ae945fbcb64d0f91c43 Update themes gallery (#2590) * c273211c8bb8c43f8e7481ae3a2efbf6ce9fcdd8 fix(docs): fix typo "yavascript" (#2570) * 6390f65052f9c0d98060d3bd404c5ce3e2d125d3 docs: fix order of events in zola overview (templates, server, content) (#2574) * c20b336cd9e97701dff6434039627c1293b03687 fix(docs): Use CSS-style comments in syntax highlight CSS suggestion snippet. (#2572) * e834c7a149d03bda735dc5260bc189fccf95e79b docs(installation): add instructions for openSUSE Leap and Tumbleweed (#2569) * 9c01b8f470b88eb3ed35e4e2389bc5be1c66f8bc Update themes gallery (#2559) * fbcffa97bb1f1aad3cd1778aefe175869cd4fcec 0.19.1 Metainfo fixes (#2550) This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/getzola/zola/_build/results?buildId=3532&view=logs).

entry.title: New release for Zola: v0.20.0
entry.content:
Welcome to this new release of Zola v0.20.0!

All artifacts are signed with this repos identity using Sigstore. You can verify the signatures using the GitHub CLI.

shell gh attestation verify --owner getzola <my-artifact>

What's Changed

  • Fix wrong URL in Codeberg Pages guide by @daudix in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2616
  • Update themes gallery by @Keats in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2617
  • Update themes gallery by @Keats in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2627
  • remove my website from examples.md (using hugo) by @andrewzah in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2638
  • Add dmarcoux.com to EXAMPLES.md by @dmarcoux in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2652
  • Improve shortcode name documentation to specify first-letter rule by @ticky in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2655
  • Update themes gallery by @Keats in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2669
  • Update themes gallery by @Keats in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2685
  • Updated github action version by @ckrenslehner in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2692
  • Update themes gallery by @Keats in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2707
  • Update themes gallery by @Keats in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2721
  • Added tags support for themes by @harrymkt in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2720
  • Update themes gallery by @Keats in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2730
  • Update Zola build deploy version to v0.19.2 by @harrymkt in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2734
  • Add new example (hermanschaaf.com) by @hermanschaaf in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2736
  • Update themes gallery by @Keats in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2746
  • Remove COPR recommendation for installation by @Gerrit0 in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2752
  • Update themes gallery by @Keats in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2770
  • Update codeberg pages deployment guide to use from_secret by @muelsyse-az in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2784
  • Add icon to external links by @FireIsGood in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2522
  • Update syntax-highlighting.md to fix alignment between line numbers and lines of code in the example snippet by @Ativerc in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2796
  • Fix typos by @deining in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2760
  • Next version by @Keats in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2615

New Contributors

  • @dmarcoux made their first contribution in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2652
  • @ticky made their first contribution in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2655
  • @ckrenslehner made their first contribution in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2692
  • @harrymkt made their first contribution in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2720
  • @hermanschaaf made their first contribution in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2736
  • @Gerrit0 made their first contribution in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2752
  • @muelsyse-az made their first contribution in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2784
  • @Ativerc made their first contribution in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2796
  • @deining made their first contribution in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2760

Full Changelog: https://github.com/getzola/zola/compare/v0.19.2...v0.20.0

entry.title: New release for Zola: v0.21.0
entry.content:
Welcome to this new release of Zola v0.21.0!

All artifacts are signed with this repos identity using Sigstore. You can verify the signatures using the GitHub CLI.

shell gh attestation verify --owner getzola <my-artifact>

What's Changed

  • Fix .gitlab-ci.yaml with v0.20.0 having multiple different build artifacts for linux available by @mb in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2799
  • Add example: Nizzlay.com by @Nizzlay in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2804
  • Refactor external link styling to use external_links_class by @welpo in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2801
  • Update themes gallery by @Keats in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2807
  • Metainfo by @Ayush1325 in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2809
  • input gitlab pages url in the CI build step by @benjaminlyng in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2822
  • Update themes gallery by @Keats in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2828
  • Docs: adds logo SVGs; replaces the favicon.ico by @indiscipline in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2827
  • Update themes gallery by @Keats in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2846
  • Update GitLab Pages deployment documentation by @walpox in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2844
  • Update themes gallery by @Keats in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2866
  • docs: add section on handling preview deployments for Cloudflare Pages by @welpo in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2868
  • [docs] Fix typo in overview by @adithyabsk in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2876
  • Update themes gallery by @Keats in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2887
  • Update themes gallery by @Keats in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2907
  • Update themes gallery by @Keats in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2914
  • Update themes gallery by @Keats in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2918
  • README: adds logo; DOCS: logo in header by @indiscipline in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2904
  • Add Lysator to examples by @sermuns in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2922
  • Update themes gallery by @Keats in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2921
  • Update themes gallery by @Keats in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2924
  • Closes the paren on page count for themes by @JustusAdam in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2923
  • Next version by @Keats in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2798

New Contributors

  • @mb made their first contribution in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2799
  • @Nizzlay made their first contribution in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2804
  • @benjaminlyng made their first contribution in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2822
  • @indiscipline made their first contribution in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2827
  • @adithyabsk made their first contribution in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2876
  • @sermuns made their first contribution in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2922
  • @JustusAdam made their first contribution in https://github.com/getzola/zola/pull/2923

Full Changelog: https://github.com/getzola/zola/compare/v0.20.0...v0.21.0
